resources.string: Credits can be used to get tips/insider information from experienced candidates/experts/manager in IT industry in your region.

Your credits can be used to get some tips from our experts and coaches how has been successful in the industry.\n\nYou can book 30 minutes session with our experts and ask them any technical information you want to know. For each 30 minutes session, your credits will be deducted by 25.

string.name: credits_usage
string.u: Click to know How to use your Credits!

resources.string: AngularJs is 21% above the ReactJs in Chennai market. However both are in high demand comparing other front end programming.
Java still tops the list in Chennai and Hyderabad requirements. However employers are not only looking for Java, but also any framework related to Java (like Spring REST).
